description:
Momo gets information about a "golden ball" from Miko and Muko. She immediately heads over to Okarun`s class to tell him and notices that he is talking to a slightly chubby male student. After school, Momo and Okarun head over to the apartment building rumored to be the site of the golden ball sightings. The chubby boy, Kinta, is following them...
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: The Secret Art of Being Attractive
